channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 4th April
item.description:
Large tree outside is lifting the footway and dropping debris everywhere. Customer is worried about pedestrians.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 4th April
item.description:
28 day with 3 way stop and go carriageway pothole 400x400x40mm tarmac patch required number 4 (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ash Tree located on Highway land problem, 4th April
item.description:
L4 infection.No OHC. Footpath siding.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Ash Tree located on Highway land

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 4th April
item.description:
Customer reporting repeated failures of 2 sets of temp lights along Green Street. Has attempted to report on 4 occasions, using number stated on info board set up at roadside. Lights currently out of action.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 4th April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed footway abrupt level difference due to tree roots please remove 1x 900x600x20mm and replace with tarmac patch tarmac patch required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
